doc:
Trevor Howard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trevor_Howard 0 Trevor Wallace Howard-Smith (29 September 1913 – 7 January 1988) was an English film actor. After varied stage work, he achieved star status with his role in the film Brief Encounter (1945), followed by The Third Man (1949). This led to many popular appearances on film and TV. Trevor_Wallace_Howard-Smith ( 29_September_1913 – 7_January_1988 ) was an_English_film_actor . After varied_stage_work , he achieved star_status with his_role in the_film_Brief_Encounter_(_1945_) , followed by The_Third_Man_(_1949_) . This led to many_popular_appearances on film_and_TV .
